value:
$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|It's time to move out, Heroes. The
fate of this world rests upon your
shoulders.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_NewYear18,Face|You can count on us. We'll give it all
we've got!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|There's no doubt in my mind.$k$pBut... I must ask...$k$pWhat do you intend to use as
weapons?$k$p$WmMPID_年明けアクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_NewYear18,Face|Well, I shall smack my foes with this
hagoita.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けタクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_NewYear18,Face|And I shall toss this mochi at mine.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_NewYear18,Face|My enemies shall be poked
repeatedly with this kadomatsu.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_NewYear18,Face|And mine shall recoil in fear at the
mere sight of Hama Ya.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I...see...$k$pPerhaps I haven't made the severity
of the situation clear. The fate of this
world rests upon your—$k$p$WmMPID_年明けタクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_NewYear18,Face|Well, we were in the middle of
preparing for our first shrine trip of the
new year when this all happened.$k$pWere you expecting us to be armed
to the teeth with real weapons of war?$k$p$WmMPID_年明けアクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_NewYear18,Face|Don't worry. If I can wield a pine
branch as a weapon and emerge
victorious, I'm sure these will serve.$k$pThe weapons matter not as long as
we give it our all! Now let's go save
this world.$k$p

$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The Tempest weakens. Thank you,
Heroes. Your efforts have saved this
world.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_NewYear18,Face|Phew, I'm so glad to hear. That
means we can get back to our shrine
trip, right?$k$p$WmMPID_年明けタクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_NewYear18,Face|Our trip was interrupted by this nasty
business, so it's only right we get
back to it.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けアクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_NewYear18,Face|May I ask, Marth... What will be your
new-year wish?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|A new-year wish? Oh... Well...$k$pI suppose my only wish has ever
been that no world should become
overwhelmed by despair.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_NewYear18,Face|Hmm... That won't do.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I beg your pardon? Why will it not?$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_NewYear18,Face|Your idealistic wish is just lovely,
dear, but taking on the weight of the
world will just suffocate you.$k$pBe true to yourself. What's YOUR
wish? Tell me something you want for
yourself.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|For...myself?$k$pWell... There is one thing I've always
wanted, above all else.$k$pI wish to see my father again. And all
the friends I've lost.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_NewYear18,Face|Oh, now that is a lovely wish. Thank
you for sharing it with us, Marth.$k$pHeehee, aren't you just a little
cutie-pie. How would you like to try on
a kimono? I happen to have a spare.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|One of your kimono? N-no, thank
you. It does not appear suited to a
man such as Marth—uh, as myself...$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_NewYear18,Face|Oh, is that so? Something tells me it
would suit someone like you perfectly
well...$k$pCome with me, Marth. Let's get you
into a changing room.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|W-wait just a second!$k$pAhem, I mean... My apologies, but I
have no time to celebrate with you.
Until we meet again, Heroes!$k$p
